author: r2sb
post: Giorgio, Do you know the ULF camera type and model used by Enrie? Did he use a yellow filter like Pia? Do you have any information regarding the camera lens he used,,e.g, glass or quartz? Enrie removed the glass window from the Shroud case before he took his photos. Do you suspect that his orthochromatic emulsion was exposed to some UV? Thanks for any insight...
title: The Definitive Word on 3D from OK?

author: r2sb
post: Hello Giorgio, My email address is rrsbarnard@verizon.net. When you have a moment and and wish to send the Ernie camera information please use this email address. I may have an idea as to why the image is impacted by the weave direction. . Hope to hear from you soon, R2 SB.
title: The Definitive Word on 3D from OK?
